pages.text: The trough is one of the most important blocks to keep your farm healthy. They are used to provide your animals with food and water.

Troughs can be filled with Water, Slop, and the following items: $(li) Wheat $(li) Apple $(li) Carrot $(li) Beetroot $(li) Potato $(li) Poisonous Potato $(li) Wheat Seeds $(li) Melon Seeds $(li) Beetroot Seeds $(li) Pumpkin Seeds $(li) Egg $(li) Beef $(li) Raw Fish
